title: Gaspare Alessandri
text: Gaspare Alessandri (14 March 1908 – 15 June 1997) was an Italian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201932%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20featherweight">men's featherweight</a> event at the <a href="1932%20Summer%20Olympics">1932 Summer Olympics</a>.
